ComicInfo.Summary: Death Metal: An Anti-Crisis + Part I + It All Matters: In the aftermath of Perpetua and The Batman Who Laughs re-making the world, Wonder Woman is queen of the Underworld but answers to The Batman Who Laughs. When the other worldly Batmen bring a mysterious prisoner to the pits of hell, she is determined to find out the prisoner's secret in order to restore the world. Meanwhile Batman challenges The Batman Who Laughs, who sends his armies of Batmen to kill the Dark Knight.
